dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: Mr. Chico used these woods to build the cattle grid and the tool shed, I think this one ended up left over and he left it here.

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: He is the caretaker of the farm, he who takes care of the farm especially when there is no one from my family around.

dialogs.name: ALMA
dialogs.sentenses: So let's ask him where she is!

dialogs.name: ZIA
dialogs.sentenses: I hope I find him around here, I'd be more relieved.
